name: Egypt
description: Egypt is a country in North Africa known for its ancient history and iconic landmarks like the Pyramids and the Sphinx.

name: South Africa
description: South Africa is located at the southern tip of the African continent and is known for its diverse culture, wildlife, and stunning landscapes.

name: Nigeria
description: Nigeria is a West African country with a rich cultural heritage, vibrant cities, and a significant role in the African economy.

name: Kenya
description: Kenya is known for its wildlife, national parks like Maasai Mara, and its long-distance runners who have excelled in international competitions.

name: Morocco
description: Morocco is located in North Africa and is known for its rich history, diverse culture, and beautiful cities like Marrakech and Casablanca.

name: Ghana
description: Ghana is a West African country known for its history as a major trading hub, vibrant festivals, and friendly people.

name: Tanzania
description: Tanzania is home to the majestic Mount Kilimanjaro and the stunning Serengeti National Park, making it a popular destination for safaris and nature enthusiasts.

name: Algeria
description: Algeria is the largest country in Africa, known for its diverse landscapes, ancient ruins, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Ethiopia
description: Ethiopia is one of the oldest countries in the world, with a unique culture, historical sites, and the famous rock-hewn churches of Lalibela.

name: Uganda
description: Uganda is known for its diverse wildlife, including mountain gorillas, as well as its lush landscapes and friendly locals.

name: Senegal
description: Senegal is located in West Africa and is known for its rich musical heritage, vibrant markets, and historic sites like Gorée Island.

name: Ivory Coast
description: Ivory Coast, also known as Côte d'Ivoire, is a West African country with a diverse culture, beautiful beaches, and a growing economy.

name: Cameroon
description: Cameroon is known for its geographical and cultural diversity, with rainforests, mountains, and savannas, as well as a mix of ethnic groups.

name: Zimbabwe
description: Zimbabwe is home to the impressive Victoria Falls, diverse wildlife in Hwange National Park, and a rich history of ancient civilizations.

name: Mali
description: Mali is known for its historic city of Timbuktu, ancient trading routes, and traditional music culture.

name: Mozambique
description: Mozambique is located along the Indian Ocean and offers stunning beaches, marine life, and a mix of cultures.

name: Angola
description: Angola is known for its diverse landscapes, from the coastal capital of Luanda to the wilds of the Okavango Delta.

name: Madagascar
description: Madagascar is an island nation with unique wildlife, including lemurs, and a blend of African, Asian, and European cultural influences.

name: Sudan
description: Sudan is known for its ancient history, including the Nubian pyramids, as well as its diverse ethnic groups and cultures.

name: Niger
description: Niger is located in West Africa and is known for its unique landscapes, including the Sahara Desert, and its nomadic Tuareg population.
